items.title: New YA Book Releases for October 15, 2025
items.description: From a climate change dystopian read to a queer Christmas fake-dating romance and more, dive into this week's array of new YA book releases.

items.title: The Most Underrated Historical Fiction According to Goodreads and Storygraph
items.description: Will you recognize any of these six underrated historical fiction books, all with under 1,000 ratings on Goodreads and Storygraph?
